name: 1 Hour Game Jam #1
description:
Hey everyone! I decided to try the 1 hour game jam. I had some free time and was curious about what the experience would be like.

I chose the theme 1 button input. 

Shooting will push the player backwards. When you hit a wall the player will rotate. Watch out of the enemies!

Currently uploaded a 32bit version. Will get a 64bit up soon. 

Controls:
Space bar to shoot
